article_title: AerCap Expects to Buy Upgraded Boeing 777, CEO Says
article_text:
The chief executive of AerCap Holdings NV said Thursday that the newly enlarged aircraft-leasing company expects to buy the upgraded Boeing Co.'s 777 jet but isn't evaluating a proposed revamp of the rival A330 from Airbus Group NV.

The Netherlands-based company plans to use its new position as the world's second-largest jet-leasing company by assets to press big jet manufacturers to focus on developing planes with common...
